steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Page Setup' group, click on the 'Margins' button.
Select 'Book fold' from the drop-down menu.
Adjust the 'Sheets per booklet' option if needed.
Click on the 'Orientation' button and select the desired orientation for the booklet.
Click on the 'Size' button and select the desired paper size for the booklet.
Click on the 'Columns' button and select the desired number of columns for the booklet.
Click on the 'OK' button to apply the changes and close the 'Page Setup' dialog box.
Review the document to ensure that the content is properly formatted for the booklet.
